TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PolyBezierSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class PolyBezierSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class PolyBezierSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示一条或多条三次方贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要存储对象对象和其他段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 由四个点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线： 起点、 终点和两个控制点。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points. A通过设置指定一个或多个三次方贝塞尔曲线的点的集合的属性。A specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the property to a collection of points. 对于每个集合中的三个点，第一个和第二个点指定的曲线的两个控点和第三个点指定的终结点。For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point. 请注意，指定曲线没有开始点，因为起始点的最后一段的结束点相同。Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment. 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一个控制点影响曲线; 的开头部分第二个控制点影响曲线的结束部分。The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve. 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用绘制两个三次方贝塞尔曲线。The following example shows how to use a to draw two cubic Bezier curves. [!code-xaml[GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip#PolyBezierSegmentExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/PolyBezierSegmentExample.xaml#polybeziersegmentexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/PolyBezierSegmentExample.cs#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/polybeziersegmentexample.vb#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)]
